metadata.datasetName: Extract All Case Information From ADM's Email 1-gold
metadata.node: Extract All Case Information From ADM's Email 1

metatunerPromptInput.prompt:
# Role & Task
You are an expert Salesforce Operations Analyst tasked with extracting key partner request information from raw email data submitted as part of a Salesforce case.
You are provided with:
- An unstructured email body containing details related to a promotional or perk request by a partner.
- Optional (extra fields) pertaining to the missing information which was not available within the original email.

# Objective
Your goal is to extract and structure key information required for the processing of partner cases. The fields that need to be extracted are:  
Email Subject, Email Body, Production Ops Type, Contact Name, Contact Email, Perk Type, Deploy When Ready (True/False), Region, Go-Live Date, Go-Live Time, End Date, End Time, Member Target, Code Batch To Be Used, Attachments (Y/N), Requested By, URL, T&Cs, Misc Change.

# Data
## ADM_Email
{ADM_Email}

From: Santhi Weiss <santhi.weiss@drmartens.com>
Date: Thu, 20 Mar 2025 at 15:39
Subject: April Loan Drop
To: Alisha Sharda <alisha.sharda@myunidays.com>


Hi Alisha

Hope you're well!

We will be going ahead with an April Loan Drop 20% boosted offer (excluding
Sale, MIE and Collabs). This will be running from 15th April 2025 to 6th
May 2025 across all markets.

For the time being, we won't be booking any specific tenancies as we won't
have the budget to support. If the performance is slower than expected, we
may review any last min availability that you may have.

Member Target: Both
T&Cs: n/a
URL: https://www.drmartens.com/gb-en

Please could you confirm, for our brand pages what creative/ copy updates
are required?

Thanks

Santhi

To: Lilli Lickert <lilli.lickert@myunidays.com>


Hi Lilli,

I hope you are well.

The post looks great. Happy for it to go live.

For the push notification, if we can't split between the two, can we please prioritise the Outlet range. We can keep the name as outlet.

I believe we have a newsletter on the 20th planned to push the Airstrait offer, however we've got signed off an "extra Â£20 off Airwrap" offer to go live from today until the 22nd . Do you think we could use that offer instead? I have attached the codes and the full offer details below. can we get the offer live on our merchant page, please?

Unidays

https://www.dyson.co.uk/hair-care/hair-stylers/airwrap-id/straight-wavy-ceramic-patina-topaz

UNIAWRCP

Go Live: 16/04/25

End Date: 22/04/2025

Member Target: Both
T&Cs: n/a

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks,

Natalia

From: Santhi Weiss <santhi.weiss@drmartens.com>
Date: Thu, 20 Mar 2025 at 15:39
Subject: April Loan Drop
To: Alisha Sharda <alisha.sharda@myunidays.com>


Hi Alisha



Hope you're well!



We will be going ahead with an April Loan Drop 20% boosted offer (excluding
Sale, MIE and Collabs). This will be running from 15th April to 6th May
across all markets.



For the time being, we won't be booking any specific tenancies as we won't
have the budget to support. If the performance is slower than expected, we
may review any last min availability that you may have.



Please could you confirm, for our brand pages what creative/ copy updates
are required?



Thanks

Santhi

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give users a bit more time in the week to use the offer. Specifically, we want to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be: This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per code. This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking. This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd, 6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome (6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th, 8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March) Please present the code to your waiter before ordering. This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including: Set menus, Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student Beans, or AA Smart Benefits. This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied to the qualifying items on the bill. This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the validity dates. This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click & Collect orders. Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time without notice. Your code is valid for code holder only. Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used. No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not being available. Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March. Member Target: Both Perk Type: Additional URL: https://www.zizzi.com/gb-en Thanks, George

OpsCaseFields.Email Body:
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give users a bit more time in the week to use the offer. Specifically, we want to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be: This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per code. This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking. This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd, 6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome (6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th, 8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March) Please present the code to your waiter before ordering. This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including: Set menus, Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student Beans, or AA Smart Benefits. This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied to the qualifying items on the bill. This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the validity dates. This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click & Collect orders. Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time without notice. Your code is valid for code holder only. Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used. No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not being available. Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March. Member Target: Both Perk Type: Additional URL: https://www.zizzi.com/gb-en Thanks, George

OpsCaseFields.Email Body:
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah
Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give
users a bit more time in the week to use the offer.  Specifically, we want
to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday
between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be:

This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per
code.
This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday
Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking.
This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an
event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast
Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd,
6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh
Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome
(6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th,
8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March)
Please present the code to your waiter before ordering.
This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6.
This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including:
Set menus,
Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student
Beans, or AA Smart Benefits.
This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied
to the qualifying items on the bill.
This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the
validity dates.
This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click &
Collect orders.
Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time
without notice.
Your code is valid for code holder only.
Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used.
No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not
being available.


Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March

Thanks,
George

"---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah
Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give
users a bit more time in the week to use the offer.  Specifically, we want
to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday
between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be:

This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per
code.
This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday
Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking.
This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an
event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast
Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd,
6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh
Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome
(6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th,
8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March)
Please present the code to your waiter before ordering.
This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6.
This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including:
Set menus,
Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student
Beans, or AA Smart Benefits.
This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied
to the qualifying items on the bill.
This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the
validity dates.
This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click &
Collect orders.
Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time
without notice.
Your code is valid for code holder only.
Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used.
No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not
being available.


Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March

Thanks,
George"

-- 
*Saf Burki*
Senior Salesforce Administrator

From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah
Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give
users a bit more time in the week to use the offer.  Specifically, we want
to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday
between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be:

This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per
code.
This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday
Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking.
This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an
event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast
Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd,
6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh
Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome
(6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th,
8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March)
Please present the code to your waiter before ordering.
This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6.
This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including:
Set menus,
Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student
Beans, or AA Smart Benefits.
This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied
to the qualifying items on the bill.
This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the
validity dates.
This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click &
Collect orders.
Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time
without notice.
Your code is valid for code holder only.
Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used.
No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not
being available.


Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March

Thanks,
George

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give users a bit more time in the week to use the offer. Specifically, we want to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be: This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per code. This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking. This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd, 6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome (6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th, 8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March) Please present the code to your waiter before ordering. This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including: Set menus, Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student Beans, or AA Smart Benefits. This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied to the qualifying items on the bill. This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the validity dates. This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click & Collect orders. Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time without notice. Your code is valid for code holder only. Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used. No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not being available. Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March. Member Target: Both Perk Type: Additional URL: https://www.zizzi.com/gb-en Thanks, George

UNIAWRCP

Natalia

---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give users a bit more time in the week to use the offer. Specifically, we want to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be: This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per code. This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking. This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd, 6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome (6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th, 8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March) Please present the code to your waiter before ordering. This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including: Set menus, Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student Beans, or AA Smart Benefits. This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied to the qualifying items on the bill. This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the validity dates. This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click & Collect orders. Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time without notice. Your code is valid for code holder only. Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used. No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not being available. Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March. Member Target: Both Perk Type: Additional URL: https://www.zizzi.com/gb-en Thanks, George

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give
users a bit more time in the week to use the offer.  Specifically, we want
to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday
between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be:

This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per
code.
This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday
Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking.

This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including:

Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student

George"

"---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah
Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give
users a bit more time in the week to use the offer.  Specifically, we want
to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday
between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be:

This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per
code.
This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday
Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking.
This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an
event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast
Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd,
6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh
Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome
(6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th,
8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March)
Please present the code to your waiter before ordering.
This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6.
This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including:
Set menus,
Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student
Beans, or AA Smart Benefits.
This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied
to the qualifying items on the bill.
This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the
validity dates.
This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click &
Collect orders.
Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time
without notice.
Your code is valid for code holder only.
Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used.
No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not
being available.


Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March

Thanks,
George"

-- 
*Saf Burki*
Senior Salesforce Administrator

From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give users a bit more time in the week to use the offer. Specifically, we want to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be: This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per code. This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking. This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd, 6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome (6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th, 8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March) Please present the code to your waiter before ordering. This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including: Set menus, Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student Beans, or AA Smart Benefits. This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied to the qualifying items on the bill. This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the validity dates. This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click & Collect orders. Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time without notice. Your code is valid for code holder only. Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used. No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not being available. Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March. Member Target: Both Perk Type: Additional URL: https://www.zizzi.com/gb-en Thanks, George

"---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: George Wright <George.Wright@zizzi.co.uk>
Date: Mon, 24 Feb 2025 at 16:17
Subject: Zizzi / Unidays - Offer Adjustment
To: Courtney Bailey Griggs <courtney.baileygriggs@myunidays.com>, Sarah
Clifford <sarah.clifford@myunidays.com>

Hi

We would like to alter the Zizzi offer on Unidays from next Monday to give
users a bit more time in the week to use the offer.  Specifically, we want
to offer 30% OFF between 5pm on Sunday and close of business on Friday
between 3rd and 26th March.

I will send some codes through and the updated T&Cs would be:

This offer entitles you to 30% off food, up to a maximum of 6 people per
code.
This offer is valid from Sunday 5pm to Friday
Excluded Zizzi restaurants: Bridgend, Chatham, London Victoria & Woking.
This offer cannot be used at the following restaurants on days when an
event is taking place: Birmingham Resorts World (6th & 13th March); Belfast
Odyssey (8th, 14th, 21st and 26th March); Birmingham Brindley Place (3rd,
6th and 11th March); Cardiff St Davids (8th, 13th & 20th March); Edinburgh
Queensferry (8th March); Leeds the Light (4th, 7th and 20th March); O2 Dome
(6th and 8th March); Resorts World (15th and 21st March); Wembley (6th,
8th, 9th, 12th, 15th, 19th, 21st, 22nd and 24th March)
Please present the code to your waiter before ordering.
This offer is only valid for group bookings of up to 6.
This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other offers including:
Set menus,
Tesco Clubcard Reward Partner codes, Tastecard, Blue Light Card, Student
Beans, or AA Smart Benefits.
This offer is valid for the code holder only and the code will be applied
to the qualifying items on the bill.
This offer can be used once every 24 hours, on multiple visits during the
validity dates.
This offer is not available on Deliveroo, Just Eat, Uber Eats or Click &
Collect orders.
Zizzi maintains the right to amend or withdraw this promotion at any time
without notice.
Your code is valid for code holder only.
Only one discount card per party, per transaction may be used.
No cash or meal alternative will be offered in lieu of a specific food not
being available.


Can you confirm you are OK to make these changes ready for Monday 3rd March

Thanks,
George"

-- 
*Saf Burki*
Senior Salesforce Administrator
